title: AEIOU Killer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Extract the vowels from somebody's role, dealing an attack based on how many vowels were in their role name.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- 1 Vowel - Basic Attack
- 2 Vowels - Powerful Attack
- 3 Vowels - Unstoppable Attack
- 4 Vowels - Overkill Attack
- 5+ Vowels - Next night, gain a bonus attack(s) based on how many extra vowels were in your target's name, following this format.
- Targets you kill have their role revealed without any vowels.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak Faction, you do not get extra kills.

desc:
Post 4770
*"vwls r vry bd!!!!! h8 vwls!!!!"*
